titleStmt.title: An exposition on the whole booke of Solomons song, commonly called the canticles. Wherein the text is explained and usefull observations raised thereupon. / By John Robotham, preacher of the gospel.
titleStmt.author: Robotham, John, fl. 1654.

titleStmt.title: An exposition on the whole booke of Solomons song, commonly called the canticles. Wherein the text is explained and usefull observations raised thereupon. / By John Robotham, preacher of the gospel.
titleStmt.author: Robotham, John, fl. 1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons, in Aldersgate-street next doore to the guilded-Lyon,

notesStmt.note: With a table of Scriptures, and a final leaf apologizing for errors.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
